general.returnToLogin: Return to Login and Signup Page

mainPage.subtitle: Welcome. Vote, register your candidacy, or configure a new election
mainPage.slogan: Sign up and participate in student elections.
mainPage.logoutSuccessDescription: You have successfully logged out of your Democracy session. Enjoy the rest of your day!

createElectionBtn.failMsg: Failed to start a new Election
createElectionBtn.electionEnableMultiSubs: Enable Candidates to Apply to Multiple Positions
createElectionBtn.tooManyElectionsErrorBody: Accounts can run a limit of three elections at once. Please delete old or unused elections.

emptyPage.title: Empty Page
emptyPage.body: This is a placeholder page, and will be replaced.

voteHomePage.title: Vote
voteHomePage.subtitle: Vote in a public election from your domain

setupHomePage.subtitle: Configure a new or existing election

electionPage.deleteElectionModalBody: Do you want to delete this election?
electionPage.electionDomainErrorMsg: You cannot participate in this election because your email domain is not

manageAccountPage.title: Account
manageAccountPage.instruction: Update or delete your Democracy account.

positionApplyPage.subSuccessModalBody: You have successfully submit your application
positionApplyPage.subLimitationModalBody: You can only apply for one position within this election.

votePage.ballotSubSuccessModalBody: Your ballot is on the way! Check back soon for results.
votePage.ballotSubFailModalBody: Failed to submit your ballot. The administrator will be notified.
votePage.ballotPositionTitle: Elect a candidate for these positions:
votePage.ballotViewCandidateInfo: Click on candidates to view their platform.

message.changeTimelineWarning: Changing the timeline is currently not restricted and can have serious consequences. In the future, starting the election will disable timeline manipulation.

error.applicationDeadlineEarly: The application deadline must be after the start date!
error.voteStartEarly: The voting start date must be after the application deadline date!
error.voteDeadlineEarly: The voting deadline must be after the voting start date!

updateNotification.successBody: The election timeline has been successfully updated.
updateNotification.errorBody: Failed to update the election timeline.

subtitle.emailVerificationError: Please ensure you have correctly followed the link from the email.

electionTimeline.review: Review of applications by election manager

platformList.title: Candidates
platformList.emptyPosition: No positions posted yet. Check back soon for updates.

deleteNotification.successBody: The position has been successfully deleted

positionList.emptyPosition: No positions posted yet. Check back soon for updates.
positionList.confirmModalBody: Do you want to delete this Position?

semiLegal.termsOfService: By using this system, you agree not to use the site for illegal activities, spam other users, violate any applicable laws, or exhibit bad manners.
semiLegal.privacyPolicy: By using this service, you agree to allow the public release of your name and email address on the website.

labels.processingResults: Results are being reviewed, thank-you for your patience.
labels.invitedToViewElection: You have been invited to view an Election
labels.loginToContinue: Please login to view this page.

errors.title: Error
errors.pleaseLogInAgain: Your credentials are invalid, please log in again.
errors.electionInvalid: Sorry, we can't find that election.
errors.cantDelete: Sorry, we couldn't delete that. Please try again later.

notOnWhitelist.title: Permission Error
notOnWhitelist.description: You are not on the whitelist for this election. If you think this is a mistake, please contact the organizer.

alreadySubmittedBallot.title: Only One Vote Allowed
alreadySubmittedBallot.description: You have already voted in this election. Please contact the election organizer if you think this is a mistake.

passwordResetRequest.title: Request a Password Reset
passwordResetRequest.description: We'll send you an email with a link you can use to change your password.

platformList.notVisibleWarning: The positions are currently not visible to users. They will be visible when the application period ends.
platformList.willShowAfterApplications: Applications are currently open. Platforms will be shown after the application period has ended.
platformList.willShowAfterReview: Applications are currently closed. Platforms are being reviewed.

passwordResetChange.title: Reset Password
passwordResetChange.description: Please enter your new password to continue.

deleteNotification.successBody: The election has been successfully deleted.

editWhitelistModal.title: Edit Whitelist
editWhitelistModal.warning: Adding emails to the whitelist will restrict who can participate in your election.
editWhitelistModal.instructions: Paste a list of plaintext emails into the box below, and it will be scanned when a user attempts to apply to a position or vote. Users not in the list will be restricted from participating.
editWhitelistModal.successNotificationBody: The election whitelist has been successfully updated
editWhitelistModal.errorNotificationBody: Failed to update the election whitelist

editElectionModal.title: Edit Election Details
editElectionModal.instructions: You can edit the title and description of the current election here
editElectionModal.successNotificationBody: The election details has been successfully updated
editElectionModal.errorNotificationBody: Failed to update the election details

votePage.noContest: No candidates applied for this position.

electionTimeline.title: Election Timeline
electionTimeline.appEndAndReview: Application period ends, platforms under review by manager
electionTimeline.voteEndAndReview: Voting period ends, results under review by manager
